file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 25-27-05-04 - CONFIG-1 - MAIN DOOR CURTAIN - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL MAIN DOOR CURTAIN - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-145 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove/install the main door curtain. B. The main door curtain is installed in the entry area of the passenger cabin, at zone 231. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ACFT MODEL(S) 25-27-05-000-801-A CURTAIN - REMOVAL EMB-145 ACFT MODEL(S) 25-27-05-400-801-A CURTAIN - INSTALLATION EMB-145 EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General CONFIG-1 25-27-05 Page 1 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 25-27-05-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-145 2. CURTAIN - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedure to remove the main door curtain. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION S.B.145-25-0086 - C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 01 Does the task Passenger cabin I. Removal SUBTASK 020-013-B (1) For aircraft PRE-MOD S.B.145-25-0086, remove the main door curtain as follows (Figure 401): (a) Loosen the snap button (10) that attach the main door curtain assembly (6) to the ceiling panel (11). (b) Loosen the snap buttons (8) that attach the main door curtain assembly (6) to the end cap assembly (9). (c) Loosen the fastener straps (14) that attach the main door curtain assembly (6) to the emergency equipment stowage unit or to the LH wardrobe, as applicable. (d) Put the main door curtain assembly (6) in the open position. (e) Remove the screw (12) that attach the stud (13) from the emergency equipment stowage unit or from the LH wardrobe. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 CONFIG-1 25-27-05 Page 2 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (f) Release the main-door-curtain (6) from hook & loop (7) from the emergency equipment stowage unit or from the LH wardrobe, as applicable. (g) Remove the screws (2) and (4) and the washers (1) and (5) that attach the curtain track assembly (3). (h) Remove the main door curtain assembly (6). (2) For aircraft POST-MOD S.B.145-25-0086, remove the main door curtain as follows (Figure 402): (a) Loosen the snap button (10) that attach the main door curtain assembly (6) to the ceiling panel (11). (b) Loosen the snap buttons (8) that attach the main door curtain assembly (6) to the end cap assembly (9). (c) Loosen the hook & loop/D-ring fastener strap (14) to release the main door curtain assembly (6) to the emergency equipment stowage unit or to the LH wardrobe, as applicable. (d) Put the main door curtain assembly (6) in the open position. (e) Remove the screws (12) and washers (13) that attach the hook & loop/D-ring fastener straps to the emergency equipment stowage unit or from the LH wardrobe, as applicable. (f) Remove the screws (2) and (4) and the washers (1) and (5) that attach the curtain track assembly (3). (g) Loosen the curtain from the hook & loop fastener (7). (h) Remove the main door curtain assembly (6). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 CONFIG-1 25-27-05 Page 3 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: FOR AIRCRAFT PRE-MOD S.B. 145-25-0086 Main Door Curtain - Removal/Installation Figure 401 3. CURTAIN TRACK 1. WASHER ASSEMBLY 2. SCREW 4. SCREW 5. WASHER 11. CEILING PANEL A ZONE 231 10. SNAP BUTTON 6. MAIN DOOR CURTAIN 9. END CAP ASSEMBLY 8. SNAP BUTTON B 7. HOOK & LOOP FASTENER 7. HOOK & LOOP FASTENER 12. SCREW 13. STUD OPEN POSITION DET. B (TYPICAL) DET. A 14. FASTENER STRAP 15. SNAP BUTTON CLOSED POSITION DET. AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: FOR AIRCRAFT POST-MOD S.B. 145-25-0086 Main Door Curtain - Removal/Installation Figure 402 3. CURTAIN TRACK ASSEMBLY 1. WASHER 2. SCREW 4. SCREW 5. WASHER A 11. CEILING PANEL ZONE 231 6. MAIN DOOR 10. SNAP CURTAIN BUTTON 9. END CAP ASSEMBLY 7. HOOK & LOOP 8. SNAP FASTENER BUTTON B 12. WASHER 13. SCREW 7. HOOK & LOOP FASTENER 14. HOOK & LOOP/ D-RING CURTAIN TYING STRAP OPEN POSITION DET. B (TYPICAL) DET. A CLOSED POSITION DET. B EM145AMM253418A.DGN EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 CONFIG-1 25-27-05 Page 5 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 25-27-05-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-145 3. CURTAIN - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedure to install the main door curtain. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION S.B.145-25-0086 - C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 01 Does the task Passenger cabin I. Installation SUBTASK 420-013-B (1) For aircraft PRE-MOD S.B.145-25-0086, install the main door curtain as follows (Figure 401): (a) Put the main door curtain assembly (6) in the open position. (b) Attach the curtain track assembly (3) with the screws (2) and (4) and the washers (1) and (5). (c) Attach the main door curtain hook & loop fastener (7) to the emergency equipment stowage unit or to the LH wardrobe, as applicable. (d) Attach the stud (13) to the emergency equipment stowage unit or to the LH wardrobe, as applicable, with the screws (12). NOTE: The screws (12) also must attach the main door curtain (6) between the buttons (7) and the equipment (10). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 CONFIG-1 25-27-05 Page 6 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (e) Put the main door curtain assembly (6) in the closed position. (f) Tighten the snap buttons (15) to attach the main door curtain assembly (6) to the emergency equipment stowage unit or to the LH wardrobe, as applicable. (g) Tighten the snap buttons (8) that attach the main door curtain assembly (6) to the end cap assembly (9). (h) Tighten the snap button (10) that attach the main door curtain assembly (6) to the ceiling panel (11). (2) For aircraft POST-MOD S.B.145-25-0086, install the main door curtain as follows (Figure 402): (a) Put the main door curtain assembly (6) in the open position. (b) Attach the curtain track assembly (3) with the screws (2) and (4) and the washers (1) and (5). (c) Attach the main-door-curtain hook & loop fastener (7) to the emergency equipment stowage unit or to the LH wardrobe, as applicable. (d) With the screws (13) and washers (12), attach the hook & loop/D-ring curtain tying straps (14) to the emergency equipment stowage unit or to the LH wardrobe, as applicable. (e) Put the main door curtain assembly (6) in the closed position. (f) Use hook & loop/D-ring fastener straps (14) to fasten the main door curtain assembly (6) to the emergency equipment stowage unit or to LH wardrobe, as applicable. (g) Use the snap buttons (8) to fasten the main door curtain assembly (6) to the end cap assembly. (h) Use the snap button (10) to fasten the main door curtain assembly (6) to the ceiling panel (11). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 CONFIG-1 25-27-05 Page 7 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
